title: Local HR
description: Local HR is a web application that allows users to search for local HR professionals and companies. Users can also post jobs and search for jobs.

index.title: A better way to explore Sanskrit
index.description: The single platform for anything related to Sanskrit language will be a comprehensive website that provides users with resources and information related to Sanskrit language. The website will include books, courses, a dictionary, information on centers of learning, and profiles of people actively working to promote Sanskrit language. Additionally, the website will have translations of all Sanskrit books to other languages.

features.subtitle: Everything you need
features.title: All-in-one platform
features.description: The Sanskrit Project is a comprehensive platform dedicated to the Sanskrit language. The project aims to promote the language as a language of the masses and provide a single platform for anything related to Sanskrit. The platform will be available on mobile, tablet, and desktop, making it easily accessible to users worldwide.

items.name: Library
items.description: Library contains all the books of Sanskrit with translations to all other languages. it consists of all Spiritual books compiles at one place.

items.name: Dictionary
items.description: The Sanskrit Project offers a comprehensive and user-friendly Sanskrit dictionary for all other languages.

items.name: Learning Materials
items.description: We offer courses, short videos, long lectures, notes, articles, blogs, and books for users of all age groups and levels of proficiency in the Sanskrit language.

items.name: Courses
items.description: The courses offered by the Sanskrit Project cater to users of all age groups and levels of proficiency in the Sanskrit language. They are designed to make the learning experience fun and interactive.

items.name: Multi lingual
items.description: The Sanskrit Project is available in English, Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, Marathi, Tamil, Gujarati, and Urdu.

items.name: Contributers
items.description: The Sanskrit Project provides a platform for contributors to share their knowledge and expertise in the Sanskrit language. Contributors can share their articles, blogs, and other content related to Sanskrit.

items.name: Mobile app
items.description: The Sanskrit Project is available on mobile, tablet, and desktop, making it easily accessible to users worldwide.

list.description: Mayash Foundation is a non-profit organization that aims to promote Sanskrit language. This foundation was founded by Himank Barve in 2022.
